radiographic_examinations.findings: Liver is homogeneously hypodense consistent with hepatic steatosis; multiple perisplenic varices with splenorenal shunt; kidneys show multiple hypodense cysts; prominent appendix measuring up to 9 mm with possible minimal hyperemia of the wall; no free fluid in the pelvis; multilevel degenerative changes in the thoracolumbar spine without vertebral body height loss or acute fracture.
